descripcion:
A strange seed was
planted on its
back at birth. The plant sprouts
and grows with
this POKÃ©MON.

When the bulb on
its back grows
large, it appears to lose the
ability to stand
on its hind legs.

The plant blooms
when it is
absorbing solar energy. It stays
on the move to
seek sunlight.

Obviously prefers
hot places. When
it rains, steam is said to spout
from the tip of
its tail.

When it swings
its burning tail,
it elevates the temperature to
unbearably high
levels.

Spits fire that
is hot enough to
melt boulders. Known to cause
forest fires
unintentionally.

After birth, its
back swells and
hardens into a shell. Powerfully
sprays foam from
its mouth.

Often hides in
water to stalk
unwary prey. For swimming fast, it
moves its ears to
maintain balance.

A brutal POKéMON
with pressurized
water jets on its shell. They are
used for high
speed tackles.

Its short feet are tipped with suction
pads that enable it to tirelessly climb
slopes and walls.

This POKéMON is
vulnerable to
attack while its shell is soft,
exposing its weak
and tender body.

In battle, it
flaps its wings
at high speed to release highly
toxic dust into
the air.

Often found in
forests, eating
leaves. It has a sharp
venomous stinger
on its head.

Almost incapable
of moving, this
POKéMON can only harden its shell
to protect itself
from predators.

It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and
its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.

A common sight in
forests and woods.
It flaps its wings at ground
level to kick up
blinding sand.

Very protective
of its sprawling
territorial area, this POKéMON will
fiercely peck at
any intruder.

When hunting, it
skims the surface
of water at high speed to pick off
unwary prey such
as MAGIKARP.

Bites anything
when it attacks.
Small and very quick, it is a
common sight in
many places.

It uses its whis­
kers to maintain
its balance. It apparently
slows down if
they are cut off.

It flaps its small wings busily to
fly. Using its beak, it searches
in grass for prey.

With its huge and
magnificent wings,
it can keep aloft without ever
having to land
for rest.

Moves silently
and stealthily.
Eats the eggs of birds, such as
PIDGEY and
SPEAROW, whole.

It is rumored that
the ferocious
warning markings on its belly
differ from area
to area.

When several of
these POKéMON
gather, their electricity could
build and cause
lightning storms.

Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself
from its own high-voltage power.

Burrows deep
underground in
arid locations far from water.
It only emerges
to hunt for food.

Curls up into a
spiny ball when
threatened. It can roll while
curled up to
attack or escape.

Although small,
its venomous
barbs render this POKéMON dangerous.
The female has
smaller horns.

The female's horn
develops slowly.
Prefers physical attacks such as
clawing and
biting.

Its hard scales
provide strong
protection. It uses its hefty
bulk to execute
powerful moves.

Stiffens its ears
to sense danger.
The larger its horns, the more
powerful its
secreted venom.

An aggressive
POKéMON that is
quick to attack. The horn on its
head secretes a
powerful venom.

It uses its
powerful tail in
battle to smash, constrict, then
break the prey's
bones.

Its magical and
cute appeal has
many admirers. It is rare and
found only in
certain areas.

A timid fairy
POKéMON that is
rarely seen. It will run and hide
the moment it
senses people.

At the time of
birth, it has
just one tail. The tail splits
from its tip as
it grows older.

Very smart and
very vengeful.
Grabbing one of its many tails
could result in a
1000-year curse.

When its huge eyes
light up, it sings
a mysteriously soothing melody
that lulls its
enemies to sleep.

The body is soft
and rubbery. When
angered, it will suck in air and
inflate itself to
an enormous size.

Forms colonies in
perpetually dark
places. Uses ultrasonic waves
to identify and
approach targets.

Once it strikes,
it will not stop
draining energy from the victim
even if it gets
too heavy to fly.

During the day,
it keeps its face
buried in the ground. At night,
it wanders around
sowing its seeds.

The fluid that
oozes from its
mouth isn't drool. It is a nectar
that is used to
attract prey.

It has the world’s largest petals. With every step,
the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.

Burrows to suck
tree roots. The
mushrooms on its back grow by draw­
ing nutrients from
the bug host.

A host-parasite
pair in which the
parasite mushroom has taken over the
host bug. Prefers
damp places.

Lives in the
shadows of tall
trees where it eats insects. It
is attracted by
light at night.

The dustlike scales covering its wings
are color-coded to indicate the kinds of
poison it has.

Lives about one
yard underground
where it feeds on plant roots. It
sometimes appears
above ground.

A team of DIGLETT
triplets.
It triggers huge earthquakes by
burrowing 60 miles
underground.

It washes its face regularly to keep the coin on
its forehead spotless. It doesn’t get along with
Galarian Meowth.

Although its fur
has many admirers,
it is tough to raise as a pet
because of its
fickle meanness.

While lulling its
enemies with its
vacant look, this wily POKéMON will
use psychokinetic
powers.

Often seen swim­
ming elegantly by
lake shores. It is often mistaken
for the Japanese
monster, Kappa.

Extremely quick to
anger. It could
be docile one moment then
thrashing away
the next instant.

Always furious
and tenacious to
boot. It will not abandon chasing
its quarry until
it is caught.

Very protective
of its territory.
It will bark and bite to repel
intruders from
its space.

A POKéMON that
has been admired
since the past for its beauty.
It runs agilely
as if on wings.

Its newly grown
legs prevent it
from running. It appears to prefer
swimming than
trying to stand.

Capable of living
in or out of
water. When out of water, it
sweats to keep
its body slimy.

An adept swimmer
at both the front
crawl and breast stroke. Easily
overtakes the best
human swimmers.

Using its ability
to read minds, it
will identify impending danger
and TELEPORT to
safety.

It emits special
alpha waves from
its body that induce headaches
just by being
close by.

Its brain can out­
perform a super­
computer. Its intelligence
quotient is said
to be 5,000.

Loves to build
its muscles.
It trains in all styles of martial
arts to become
even stronger.

Its muscular body
is so powerful, it
must wear a power save belt to be
able to regulate
its motions.

Using its heavy
muscles, it throws
powerful punches that can send the
victim clear over
the horizon.

A carnivorous
POKéMON that traps
and eats bugs. It uses its root
feet to soak up
needed moisture.

It spits out
POISONPOWDER to
immobilize the enemy and then
finishes it with
a spray of ACID.

Said to live in
huge colonies
deep in jungles, although no one
has ever returned
from there.

Drifts in shallow
seas. Anglers who
hook them by accident are
often punished by
its stinging acid.

The tentacles are
normally kept
short. On hunts, they are extended
to ensnare and
immobilize prey.

Found in fields
and mountains.
Mistaking them for boulders,
people often step
or trip on them.

Rolls down slopes
to move. It rolls
over any obstacle without slowing
or changing its
direction.

Its boulder-like
body is extremely
hard. It can easily withstand
dynamite blasts
without damage.

Its hooves are 10
times harder than
diamonds. It can trample anything
completely flat
in little time.

Very competitive,
this POKéMON will
chase anything that moves fast
in the hopes of
racing it.

Incredibly slow
and dopey. It
takes 5 seconds for it to feel
pain when under
attack.

The SHELLDER that
is latched onto
SLOWPOKE's tail is said to feed
on the host's left
over scraps.

Uses anti-gravity
to stay suspended.
Appears without warning and uses
THUNDER WAVE and
similar moves.

Formed by several
MAGNEMITEs linked
together. They frequently appear
when sunspots
flare up.

The sprig of
green onions it
holds is its weapon. It is
used much like a
metal sword.

A bird that makes
up for its poor
flying with its fast foot speed.
Leaves giant
footprints.

Uses its three
brains to execute
complex plans. While two heads
sleep, one head
stays awake.

The protruding
horn on its head
is very hard. It is used for
bashing through
thick ice.

Stores thermal
energy in its
body. Swims at a steady 8 knots
even in intensely
cold waters.

Appears in filthy
areas. Thrives by
sucking up polluted sludge
that is pumped
out of factories.

Thickly covered
with a filthy,
vile sludge. It is so toxic, even
its footprints
contain poison.

Its hard shell
repels any kind
of attack. It is vulnerable
only when its
shell is open.

When attacked, it
launches its
horns in quick volleys. Its
innards have
never been seen.

Almost invisible,
this gaseous
POKéMON cloaks the target and
puts it to sleep
without notice.

Because of its
ability to slip
through block walls, it is said
to be from an­
other dimension.

Under a full moon,
this POKéMON
likes to mimic the shadows of
people and laugh
at their fright.

As it grows, the
stone portions of
its body harden to become similar
to a diamond, but
colored black.

Puts enemies to
sleep then eats
their dreams. Occasionally gets
sick from eating
bad dreams.

When it locks eyes
with an enemy, it
will use a mix of PSI moves such as
HYPNOSIS and
CONFUSION.

Its pincers are
not only powerful
weapons, they are used for balance
when walking
sideways.

The large pincer
has 10000 hp of
crushing power. However, its huge
size makes it
unwieldy to use.

Usually found in
power plants.
Easily mistaken for a POKé BALL,
they have zapped
many people.

It stores electric
energy under very
high pressure. It often explodes
with little or no
provocation.

Often mistaken
for eggs.
When disturbed, they quickly
gather and attack
in swarms.

Legend has it that
on rare occasions,
one of its heads will drop off and
continue on as an
EXEGGCUTE.

Because it never
removes its skull
helmet, no one has ever seen
this POKéMON's
real face.

The bone it holds
is its key weapon.
It throws the bone skillfully
like a boomerang
to KO targets.

When in a hurry,
its legs lengthen
progressively. It runs smoothly
with extra long,
loping strides.

While apparently
doing nothing, it
fires punches in lightning fast
volleys that are
impossible to see.

Its tongue can be
extended like a
chameleon's. It leaves a tingling
sensation when it
licks enemies.

Because it stores
several kinds of
toxic gases in its body, it is
prone to exploding
without warning.

Where two kinds
of poison gases
meet, 2 KOFFINGs can fuse into a
WEEZING over many
years.

A POKéMON with a
one-track mind.
Once it charges,  it won't stop
running until it
falls asleep.

Protected by an
armor-like hide,
it is capable of living in molten
lava of 3,600
degrees.

A rare and elusive
POKéMON that is
said to bring happiness to those
who manage to get
it.

The whole body is
swathed with wide
vines that are similar to sea­
weed. Its vines
shake as it walks.

The infant rarely
ventures out of
its mother's protective pouch
until it is 3
years old.

Known to shoot
down flying bugs
with precision blasts of ink
from the surface
of the water.

Capable of swim­
ming backwards by
rapidly flapping its wing-like
pectoral fins and
stout tail.

Its tail fin
billows like an
elegant ballroom dress, giving it
the nickname of
the Water Queen.

In the autumn spawning season, they can
be seen swimming powerfully up rivers and
creeks.

If its body is torn, it can grow
back if the red core remains.
The core flashes at midnight.

Its central core
glows with the
seven colors of the rainbow. Some
people value the
core as a gem.

If interrupted
while it is
miming, it will slap around the
offender with its
broad hands.

With ninja-like
agility and speed,
it can create the illusion that
there is more
than one.

It seductively
wiggles its hips
as it walks. It can cause people
to dance in
unison with it.

Normally found
near power plants,
they can wander away and cause
major blackouts
in cities.

Its body always
burns with an
orange glow that enables it to
hide perfectly
among flames.

If it fails to
crush the victim
in its pincers, it will swing it
around and toss
it hard.

When it targets
an enemy, it
charges furiously while whipping its
body with its
long tails.

In the distant
past, it was
somewhat stronger than the horribly
weak descendants
that exist today.

Once it begins to rampage, a
GYARADOS will burn everything
down, even in a harsh storm.

A POKéMON that
has been over­
hunted almost to extinction. It
can ferry people
across the water.

Capable of copying
an enemy's genetic
code to instantly transform itself
into a duplicate
of the enemy.

Its genetic code
is irregular.
It may mutate if it is exposed to
radiation from
element STONEs.

Lives close to
water. Its long
tail is ridged with a fin which
is often mistaken
for a mermaid's.

It accumulates
negative ions in
the atmosphere to blast out 10000-
volt lightning
bolts.

When storing
thermal energy in
its body, its temperature could
soar to over 1600
degrees.

A POKéMON that
consists entirely
of programming code. Capable of
moving freely in
cyberspace.

Although long
extinct, in rare
cases, it can be genetically
resurrected from
fossils.

A prehistoric
POKéMON that died
out when its heavy shell made
it impossible to
catch prey.

A POKéMON that
was resurrected
from a fossil found in what was
once the ocean
floor eons ago.

Its sleek shape is
perfect for swim­
ming. It slashes prey with its
claws and drains
the body fluids.

A Pokémon that roamed the skies
in the dinosaur era. Its teeth are
like saw blades.

Very lazy. Just
eats and sleeps.
As its rotund bulk builds, it
becomes steadily
more slothful.

A legendary bird
POKéMON that is
said to appear to doomed people who
are lost in icy
mountains.

A legendary bird
POKéMON that is
said to appear from clouds while
dropping enormous
lightning bolts.

Known as the
legendary bird of
fire. Every flap of its wings
creates a dazzling
flash of flames.

Long considered a
mythical POKéMON
until recently when a small
colony was found
living underwater.

A mystical POKéMON
that exudes a
gentle aura. Has the ability
to change climate
conditions.

An extremely
rarely seen
marine POKéMON. Its intelligence
is said to match
that of humans.

It was created by
a scientist after
years of horrific gene splicing and
DNA engineering
experiments.

So rare that it
is still said to
be a mirage by many experts. Only
a few people have
seen it worldwide.
